content.title: Cost Analysis
content.subtitle: Estimate costs with zoning layers, measurement units, and configurable parameters.
description: The Cost Analysis tool enables you to assign costs to different land-use zones and calculate expenses based on measurements such as area, length, or volume. Results are instantly visualized in infographics on the map.
Open the layer menu and select 'Cost' (third option).
1. Select a predefined cost configuration and currency.
- Cubic feet (includes thickness for volume-based costs).
Finally, enter cost values, save, and run the model. Results will appear instantly in map infographics.
